Yes
Vol I:
"The world of Kemonus is about 70% water and 30% land.\! It is regarded
as the biggest planet in our solar system.\! Although the planet
is mostly water, the continents themselves are very large.\! Kemonus is
divided into 4 continents and 3 oceans.
The continents are: Harras, Dracomo, Illus, and Somnus. The oceans are: Vehementi,
Aurora, and Frigus.\! The ocean of Aurora separates the continents of
Harras and Dracomo, while the ocean of Frigus separates Harras and
Somnus.\! Illus is surrounded by the ocean of Vehemeti."
End of Volume I.
No
A bunch of books are lined here.\! A particular one stands out: Atlas Vol.II\!
Read?
Yes
No
Yes
Vol II: Harras
Harras is the second largest continent.\! It's divided into 4 large nations:
Rhod, which is on the North end of the continent.\! Praquus, is in the center of
the continent.\! Gikoku, is to the South of the continent.\! Kentaros is an
island to the East of Praquus, about 1258 km away.
Harras has a lot of mountainous regions and is the closest to the North
out of all the continents.\! Harras, particularly on Rhod, sees very cold
winters.\! There are a lot of mountain ranges, the most prominent
being, the mountain range of Tumbling Boulders.
Harras is also home to many different races.\! It is the most biologically
diverse out of the continents, and also home to a plethora of different
plants.
End of Volume II.
No
A bunch of books are lined here.\! A particular one stands out: Atlas Vol.III\!
Read?
Yes
No
Yes
Vol III: Harras - Rhod
Rhod is the Northmost country in Kemonus.\! The predominant race is
Rhodian, followed by Praquians.\! Rhod is a constitutional monarchy as of
300 years ago, when the Trost monarchy agreed to reform the government to
give the people more freedom to dictate the future of Rhod.
Rhod is a country best known for maintaining a completely neutral stance and
has never had any form of military involvement, with the exception of
providing aid to those affected in the Bloody Revolution.
Rhod is a primary exporter of dairy products, producing some of the best
cheeses in the world.\! Rhod is also known as the capital of food.\! The
gastronomy in the capital, Rhodia, is regarded as best in the world.
End of Volume III.
No
A bunch of books are lined here.\! A particular one stands out: Atlas Vol.IV\!
Read?
Yes
No
Yes
Vol IV: Harras - Praquus
Praquus is located in the center of Harras, and its the largest of the
4 countries in Harras.\! Praquians are the most prodominant race, followed
by humans.\! It has been a democratic republic for over 500 years following
the excommunication of the Osulf royal family.
Praquus is known for having the strongest military force on the planet. However,
they have had no history of invading other countries. Praquus is a country
that's always had internal conflicts.\! It was before many different small
monarchies, that were constantly at war with each other.
After many years, 3 different countries were formed within Praquus.\! Tensions between
praquians and humans reached a tipping point and war broke out with praquians
subjugating humans and eliminating at least 75% of human population in Praquus.
Sigmund Osulf the Conquerer would later sieze control of the three
kingdoms and formally establishes the kingdom of Praquus in 450.\! Praquus
would later be at odds with their neighbohrs, only reaching peace agreements
after years of military and political conflicts.
The Bloody Revolution happened 500 years ago, and it is also a period
of darkness given that many records about that time have gone missing or
were destroyed by the Osulf during their escape from Praquus.\!
Praquus remains peaceful since the end of the revolution.
End of Volume IV.
No
A bunch of books are lined here.\! A particular one stands out: Atlas Vol.V\!

Yes
No
Yes
Vol V: Harras - Gikoku
Gikoku is the Southernmost country in Harras.\! It's densely forressted
and mountainous, which severely contributed to its isolation.\! Gikoku
is also a monarchy, with the ruler only being female.\! The predominant
race is kimimi.
Gikoku is known primarly for having an agriculturally centric ecnomoy.\!
Tourism is also a major role player in its economy.\! It's a country that
has preserved its way of life, and has been unchanged for thousands of
years.\! It's melded well with modern life.
End of Volume IV.

Vol VI: Harras - Kentaros
Kentaros is a very reserved country, with only allowing people to visit
with special visas.\! Kentaros is a monarchy as well, with the ruler being
considered close to divinity, similarly to Gikoku's empress.\! The predominant
races are centaurs and elves.
Although Kentaros is reserved, it has assimilated modernization.\! Although
highly debated, Kentaros is considered the most technologically advanced
country.\! It's denizens are very popular in entertainment mediums, and because
of the size of the population, human resource is a big economic contribution.
End of Volume VI.

Kemonus Anatomy Vol.I\!

Yes
No
Yes
Vol I: Praquian
Praquians are naturally tall, possibly the tallest of all races.\! They
are characterized for having horse ears and long hairy tails.\! Praquians
lean towards having strong physical prowess, and are very quick with their
feet.\!
Praquians can be divided into two subsets: Stallions and Mares.\! These distinctions
only refer to those that can breed.\! These include males and futanaris. Whether or not
a stallion has both reproductive organs or not, stallions may either have masculine or
completely feminine traits.\! There are more stallions than mares.
Mares refer to those who can be bred, and include females and futanari.\!
Mares with single reproductive organs are not uncommon, but range less in
numbers than their stallion counterparts.
End of Volume I.
No
A bunch of books are lined here.\! A particular one stands out:
Kemonus Anatomy Vol.II\!
Read?
Yes
No
Yes
Vol I: Kimimi
Kimimi are characterized for their large fox ears and big fluffy tails.\!
This race is on average the smallest of Kemonus. In most literature and
folklore, kimimi are portrayed as magically/spiritually gifted, as well
as closely linked with the gods.
Kimimi may sometimes have more than one tail, with the most being 9
tails.\! It is said that the more tails a kimimi has, the more divine
they are.\! The line of empresses of Gikoku all have had 9 tails,
hence their relation to being divine beings.
Futanari are rare exceptions for Kimimi, and don't often occur.\!
Those that are born futanari often dedicate to working as shrine maidens
as they are often considered more spiritually inclined than their other
kin.
End of Volume II.

A bunch of books are lined here.\! A particular one stands out:
Kemonus Anatomy Vol.III\!

Yes
Vol III: Bovinus
Bovinus (Rhodians) are generously proportioned and largely female.\!
They are characterized for their horns and large loose ears.\! Out of all
the races, they tend to have the largest bosoms on average.
Males are rare, so bovinus tend to mingle with other races.\! Futanari are
uncommon, but not a rarity.\! Bovinus females produce a lot of milk on
average and it's been proven to be incredibly healthy to drink for other
races.\! Bovinus are also able to carry things at least three times their weight.
End of Volume III.

Vol IV: Humans
Humans are physically average, but normally possess higher intellect
over the other races.\! Outside of that, they do not possess unique
physical traits.\! Are normally regarded in folklore as having limitless
potential and strong wills.
Humans have even ratios between males and females, but futanari are less
common than the previously mentioned races.

Vol V: Centaurs
Centaurs are the largest of the races because of their half praquian
half horse bodies.\! Their praquian halves have different ears, than
normal praquians, and are proportionally more gifted.\! Within centaurs
there are also unicorns, which are an extremely rare breed.
Centaurs are distinct in that they are uniquely female or futanari.\! Which
are 1:1 ratio in population.\! They are a proud race and normally
breed amongst themselves or in some cases with elves.
End of Volume V.

Vol VI: Elves
Elves share the same physiology as humans with minor differences.\! They
are taller on average than humans.\! Their ears are slightly longer and
pointier.!\ Futas are a rarity within elves, but are held in very high
regard, most holding high positions in their communes.
End of Volume VI.

Vol VII: Dragons
It is important to note that this race is still debated, but a ton of
evidence seems to point towards their existance.\! The data gathered from
evidence goes as follows:
-It is believed they were exactly similar to humans in appearance.
-They are assumed to be the strongest species to have existed.
-Dragons were capable of transforming into real dragons.
-They were constantly at odds with other races, particularly humans.
-They were heavily prosecuted at times.
There is a ton data and evidence to suggest their existance as previously
mentioned, but it is heavily contested.\! Most scholars seem to come
to the conclusion that they were more of a clandestine cult rather than
a race, as dragons do not exist in the animal kingdom.
End of Volume VII.
No
A bunch of books are lined here.\! A particular one stands out:
Order of the Elements\!
Read?
Yes
No
Yes
There are 7 elements that exist in nature. First the original two, Order
and Chaos, and their descendants Water, Earth, Fire, Thunder, and Wind.\!
Fire and Thunder are directly childern of Chaos, and Water and Earth are
children of Order. Wind is the children of both, and therefore neutral.
It is believed every living being is naturally atuned to one element since
birth.\! People interpret personalities from elements, or in some respects
attempt to predict the future depending on what element the person is
believed to be attuned to. Here are some of the interpretations:
-Fire: Passionate, strong of will, lack fears, are not as smart as their peers
-Water: Beautiful, Caring, Younger for longer, tend to suffer the most emotionally
-Earth: Resilient, tough emotionally and physically, protective, have difficulty
adapting
-Thunder: quick-witted, commanding, agile, tend to be emotionally restricted
-Wind: Understanding, mysterious, smart, physically weaker than their peers
-Order: Truthful, stoic, paragon, prone to have a one track mind
-Chaos: Unruly, heroic, brilliant, are normally more agressive than their peers
It's important to note that these are some of the assumptions made in
personality readings, and also based on important historic figures and
what they claimed to be their elemental inclination.\! It's not an accurate
personality analysis.
End of the book.
No
A bunch of books are lined here.\! A particular one stands out:
Birth of the Cosmos: An In-depth Study\!
Read?
Yes
No
Yes
Major religions around the world seem to come to a solid conclusion about
the existence of 7 elements and that there are gods (and goddesses) for each
element.\! Interestingly enough, most religions seem to have a similar story
for the creation of the universe itself.
It is believed that at first only Order and Chaos existed.\! Chaos gave birth
to Life, while Order introduced Death.\! They both created their children,
Water, Earth, Fire, Thunder, and Wind.\! Their children asked if they could
subsequently create their own children, and they allowed them to.
Chaos and Order then create a universe for their children to use as a
canvas for their creation.\! There was one rule the parents imposed,
however.\! "All existence should be given free will and control over
their destiny."\! And so Kemonus was created and breathed life into.
It's important to point out that it is highly debated, whether or not
Order and Chaos are children themselves.\! There are some who believe
that there's a singular entity, dubbed by some as the God of Time, that
created Order and Chaos.\! It's not, however, widely accepted.
End of the book.
No

Super Thunder Sigil Saga: Ultimate Fanbook Vol.I\!
Read?
Yes
No
Yes
Chapter 1: Effective Unit Usage
There are tons of units in STSS, but how does one effectively use them?\!
First we need to understand a few things about the lore of the game to
grasp the basics of good deployment balance!\! As of the latest update,
the game currently has 7 races.
Humans: These are the most versatile race, being able to assume many jobs!\!
Their claim to fame, however, is that they are the only race with the
ability to use more than one element, and are the only ones to be able to
control Order and Chaos elements!
Dragons: These are the apex units of the game in terms of stats, generally.
Their glaring weakness to magic and elements, primarily fire, can make
it difficult to deploy sometimes.\! While they themselves cannot use elements,
there are some extremely rare units that can use elements.
Continue reading?
Yes
No
Yes
Praquians: These are your Earth and Thunder units normally.\! Praquians are
quite the balanced units in offense and defense.\! Deploying these units solo
is ok in most circumstances, but their buffing skills are what you
want to use them for mostly!\! Only race with Ruler skills.
Centaurs: The calvary has arrived!\! These are the units with most movement
and highest Hit and Aigility on average.\! They are better suited for
being used as archers.\! They're a little low on the Defense side, but
their Resistance proves them effective mage and elementalist killers.
Elves: So far the least available, and rarest, race in game.\! The current
amount of units available seem to reveal that it's a very magic and healer
oriented race.\! Are the only race solely attuned to Chaos and Order.
Continue reading?
Yes
No
Yes
Kimimi: THE definitive magic and elementalist class!\! This race is
especially attuned to Fire, Water, and Wind.\! While generally physically
weaker on average, their high magic stats make them a force to be
reckoned with.\! Are best used with the company of a tank.
Bovinus: Protect, attack, and love.\! You cannot have enough of these
units!\! While they may be really susceptible to magic, their offensive
and defensive stats are among the best in the game.\! Bovinus have lower
movement stats, but it doesn't matter much now does it?
End of Volume 1.

Super Thunder Sigil Saga: Ultimate Fanbook Vol.II\!
Read?
Yes

Yes
Chapter 2: Elements and You
It's surprising how many people forget to properly read through the
tutorials!\! Learning about elements is essential to your victory, and
to come out on top during PVPs!\! Unlike it's other contemporary counterparts,
STSS does not use weapons advantages, but solely elemental "triangles".
Elements, with the exception of Wind being a neutral element, are divided
into two categories. Those that are Order Elements, and those that are
Chaos Elements.\! Order Elements are: Water, Earth, and Order.\!
Chaos Elements are: Fire, Thunder, and Chaos.
It's important to know because elements affect unit combat, not just the
effectiveness of their magic and elementalism.\! For example, an archer
that is attuned to Water can deal to more damage to a unit that is
attuned to Fire.
The weaknesses go as follows:
Water is strong against Fire, but weak to Thunder.\! Fire is strong
against Earth.\! Thunder is weak to Earth.\! Water and Earth are weaker
towards Chaos, but Chaos has no advantages over them.\! Same with Fire
and Thunder with Order.\! Order and Chaos are strong and weaker towards
each other.\! Wind units do not receive and buffs or debuffs being
neutral.\! Because of this, Wind units are better used as tanks or
healers.
